EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Strata-Hadoop World_Q415.Customer Dinner
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
It was a pleasure having you at our Strata + Hadoop World <http://pivotal.io/event/strata-ny-2015> dinner last night at Keens. We hope you enjoyed the opportunity to network, catch up with friends and discuss the ever-changing world of big data with Pivotal and our partner, EMC <http://www.emc.com/big-data>.
If you haven't already, please visit our booth (# 531) to get the latest Open Source Big Data news, learn more about Apache HAWQ <http://hawq.incubator.apache.org/> and the ODPi <http://odpi.org/>, or just speak with our industry experts.
Also, check out the most recent Pivotal news <https://pivotal.io/big-data/press-release/pivotal-open-sources-top-analytics-engine> and blogs <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal>.
We look forward to seeing you at our next event <http://pivotal.io/news-events/#events>!
Cheers, The Pivotal Team
